an6.32:1.1: Atha kho annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho sa devata bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.32:2.3: Satthugaravata, dhammagaravata, sanghagaravata, sikkhagaravata, appamadagaravata, patisantharagaravata—
an6.32:2.4: ime kho, bhante, cha dhamma bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti”ti.
an6.32:2.7: Atha kho sa devata “samanunno me sattha”ti bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi.
an6.32:3.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa rattiya accayena bhikkhu amantesi:
an6.32:3.2: “imam, bhikkhave, rattim annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho, bhikkhave, sa devata mam etadavoca:
an6.32:3.5: Satthugaravata, dhammagaravata, sanghagaravata, sikkhagaravata, appamadagaravata, patisantharagaravata—
an6.32:3.6: ime kho, bhante, cha dhamma bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti’ti.
an6.32:3.8: Idam vatva mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayiti.
